Summary: sphere UFOs released small orbs & magnetic
divs: sighting detailson the 9th of aug 2005, evening 5:45 pm. a group of 5 spinning & shuffling ufo light balls( closed together) released 2(?) small orbs on top of my roof. i stood right under light balls and took 5 pictures for them. between those 5 pictures my camera was twice affected by a strong electro-magnetic field. it made the screen of camera viewfinder turning black (i also heard the ���pop��� sound from the camera). i have had to wait for few seconds for the viewfinder to work again, then i can look thorough the viewfinder. the object suddenly turned into a colorful electro- fog and disappeared. this case is one of my long term visitation, more details from: *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg).
